item.description:
It's February and that means Valentine's Day is upon us...

We are joining the Hello Stiletto Shoe Club for a wonderful Valentines themed party! In honor of the season, join us for a special *Red Shoe Party* Wednesday, February 9th from 6 to 8pm at Lobby Bar.

Break out those shoes that make you, and all around you, swoon. Make sure they're crimson, scarlet, cherry or ruby red. We'll invite you to share the love by showing them off on the Hello Stiletto pink carpet.

Enjoy complimentary hors d'oeuvres while you mingle and compete for title of "Best in Shoe."

Please also join the the Hello Stiletto Shoe Club at www.shoeclub.us

It is free to join and your info is not shared. 

Look for Catherine (see photo), if you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.why: We are spending the evening with the Hello Stiletto Shoe Club- a social organization for women who love shoes. Break out your favorite romantic shoes and have a wonderful night enjoying cocktails, socializing and free appetizers.
item.name: Ladies Night: Red Shoe Party Valentines Celebration, Free Apps
